description: This file defines a React component for the homepage of a dashboard application, managing connections to various services, handling user interactions such as opening portals, rotating keys, disconnecting services, and providing a chat interface. It imports components from local project paths and uses dynamic imports for API calls.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main React functional component rendering the dashboard page with connection management and chat features.

methods.name: getErrorMessage
methods.description: Utility function to extract error messages from unknown error objects.

methods.name: openPortal
methods.description: Asynchronously attempts to open a portal URL for a given connector, with fallback behavior.

methods.name: rotateKey
methods.description: Asynchronously rotates the API key for a specified connector.

methods.name: makeActions
methods.description: Generates action buttons based on the connector status.
